author: Lucy Craymer
title: Global Stock Slump Marches On
text:
Major U.S. stock indexes fall more than 5% for the week Markets in Hong Kong, Japan sharply lower $30.6 billion in weekly outflows from equity funds U.S. stocks ended a wild week with gains but suffered their steepest weekly losses in more than two years, with major indexes dropping more than 5% and investors bracing for more volatility ahead.
